clauses.title: The service can delete your account without prior notice and without a reason
clauses.description: At any time, your account can be terminated without explanation and without warning by the service.
clauses.clause_text:
We reserve the right, without notice and in our sole discretion, to terminate or suspend your account or your right to access or use our Platform.
A Collective can also be suspended or discontinued at any time by us, the Host or the Collective Administrator.
We are not responsible for any loss or harm related to your inability to access or use our Platform.

case.text: Your account can be deleted or permanently suspended without prior notice and without a reason

clauses.title: If you offer suggestions to the service, they become the owner of the ideas that you give them
clauses.description: The service can claim ownership on feedback, proposals, ideas and suggestions submitted by the users, who may waive their "moral rights" on that feedback.
clauses.clause_text: We will own exclusive rights, including, without limitation, all intellectual property rights, in and to Feedback and will be entitled to the unrestricted use and dissemination of Feedback for any purpose, commercial or otherwise, without acknowledgment or compensation to you.

case.text: If you offer suggestions to the service, they become the owner of the ideas that you give them

clauses.title: The court of law governing the terms is in a jurisdiction that is less friendly to user privacy protection (USA)
clauses.description: The Terms are governed by the applicable laws of a jurisdiction known for weak data regulations and poor user privacy protection. Usually contributors will need to explain in the Analysis view of each point linked to this Case the reason why it shall be applied.
clauses.clause_text:
Open Collective is based in the United States and the information we collect is governed by U.S.
law.

case.text: The court of law governing the terms is in a jurisdiction that is less friendly to user privacy protection.

clauses.title: The service may use tracking pixels, web beacons, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting on users.
clauses.description: Tracking technologies (such as web beacons, tracking pixels...) are employed on users and/or the service assigns a unique ID to a browser or device to track its behaviour.
clauses.clause_text: We use various technologies to collect information, including cookies, local storage and web beacons.

case.text: You are tracked via web beacons, tracking pixels, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting

clauses.title: The service can sell or otherwise transfer your personal data as part of a bankruptcy proceeding or other type of financial transaction.
clauses.description: If the service gets acquired or is involved in a merger, bankruptcy, reorganisation or sale, your personal data may be transferred or sold.
clauses.clause_text: <li>In connection with, or during negotiations of, any merger, sale of Open Collective assets, financing or acquisition of all or a portion of our business by another Open Collective.

case.text: Your personal data may be sold or otherwise transferred as part of a bankruptcy proceeding or other type of financial transaction

clauses.title: Your data may be processed and stored anywhere in the world
clauses.description: Your data is stored all over the world, including in countries where data protection rules may differ from the ones of the service's jurisdiction or those of your country jurisdiction.
clauses.clause_text:
By accessing or using the Services or otherwise providing information to us, you consent to the processing, transfer and storage of information in and to the U.S.
and other countries, where you may not have the same rights and protections as you do under local law.

case.text: Your data may be processed and stored anywhere in the world

clauses.title: Users shall not interfere with another person's enjoyment of the service
clauses.description:
Users are asked not to interfere with another person't enjoyment in using the service.
However, this statement is very vague and open to interpretation by the service itself.
clauses.clause_text: Full Text: "You will not: [...] Use our Platform in any manner that could interfere with, disrupt, negatively affect or inhibit other users from fully enjoying our Platform or that could damage, disable, overburden or impair the functioning of our Platform in any manner"

case.text: You shall not interfere with another person's enjoyment of the service

clauses.title: No need to register
clauses.description: This service can be used without providing a user profile.
clauses.clause_text: You may need to register for an account to access some or all of the Platform.

case.text: No need to register

clauses.title: The website is open-source
clauses.description: The code of the software is open-source and the users can have access to the source code.
clauses.clause_text: Since our entire code base is open source, anyone can easily audit it.

case.text: The service is open-source

clauses.title: The service provides information about how they intend to use your personal data
clauses.description: The Privacy Policy explains the purposes for which data is collected and the way it is processed, used and shared.
clauses.clause_text: Use of Information

case.text: Information is provided about how your personal data is used

clauses.title: Your personal data is not sold
clauses.description: This service makes an explicit promise not to sell "personal data" of users.
clauses.clause_text: We are not in the business of selling data to any 3rd party.

case.text: Your personal data is not sold

clauses.title: The service claims to be GDPR compliant for European users
clauses.description: The service has a different behavior towards users protected by the GDPR.
clauses.clause_text: Open Collective is GDPR compliant.

case.text: The service claims to be GDPR compliant for European users

clauses.title: You can opt out of promotional communications
clauses.description: You can update your account preferences and/or easily unsubscribe of email/sms lists to stop receiving promotional communications.
clauses.clause_text:
You may opt out of receiving promotional or notification emails from Open Collective by following the instructions in those emails.
If you opt out, we may still send you non-promotional emails, such as those about your account or our ongoing business relations.

case.text: You can opt out of promotional communications

clauses.title: The service has a no refund policy
clauses.description: Payments are final and can't be refunded unless required by law.
clauses.clause_text: Refunds. Except as provided in these Terms, ALL CONTRIBUTIONS ARE FINAL, AND THERE ARE NO REFUNDS.

case.text: The service has a no refund policy

clauses.title: There is a date of the last update of the agreements
clauses.description: The given text has a date that allows to know when it was last updated.
clauses.clause_text: Last Updated: 16 August 2019

case.text: There is a date of the last update of the agreements

clauses.title: Prohibits political discussions or campaigning
clauses.description: Political content in the form or pictures, discussions, or campaigning isn't allowed.
clauses.clause_text: Full Text: "You may not create, post, store or share any User Content that: [...] Contains any unsolicited promotions, political campaigning, advertising or solicitations"

case.text: Political discussions or campaining are prohibited

clauses.title: Users agree not to submit libelous, harassing or threatening content
clauses.description: This service prohibits users from submitting content of a variety of types. This can include content that is unlawful, harassing, abusive, threatening, libelous, sexist, racist, homophobic, transphobic, or discriminatory in any other way.
clauses.clause_text: Full Text: "You may not create, post, store or share any User Content that: Is unlawful, libelous, defamatory, obscene, pornographic, indecent, lewd, suggestive, harassing, threatening, invasive of privacy or publicity rights, abusive, inflammatory or fraudulent"

case.text: You agree not to submit libelous, harassing or threatening content

clauses.title: Prohibits the posting of pornographic content
clauses.description: Users are not allowed to post any content of pornographic nature. This includes adult content, things that are sexually explicit, or obscene.
clauses.clause_text: Full Text: "You may not create, post, store or share any User Content that: Is unlawful, libelous, defamatory, obscene, pornographic, indecent, lewd, suggestive, harassing, threatening, invasive of privacy or publicity rights, abusive, inflammatory or fraudulent"

case.text: The posting of pornographic content is prohibited

clauses.title: This service is only available to users over a certain age
clauses.description: The Services are intended for users who are at least a certain age. If you are younger than the age required then you are prohibited from using the Service.
clauses.clause_text: You must be at least 18 years of age to access or use our Platform.

case.text: This service is only available to users over a certain age

clauses.title: Failure to enforce any provision of the Terms of Service does not constitute a waiver of such provision
clauses.description: Even if the service does not or not always enforce all of the rules or provisions contained in its terms, they still apply. Users can at a later time still be held accountable for violating provisions that have not been enforced consistently.
clauses.clause_text: The failure of to exercise or enforce any right or provision of these Terms will not operate as a waiver of such right or provision.

case.text: Failure to enforce any provision of the Terms of Service does not constitute a waiver of such provision

clauses.title: Invalidity of any portion of the Terms of Service does not entail invalidity of its remainder
clauses.description: Should any portion of the Terms of Service be unenforceable or invalid, that portion will be enforced to the fullest extent permitted by applicable law and the remainder of the TOS will remain valid and enforceable.
clauses.clause_text: If any provision or part of a provision of these Terms is unlawful, void or unenforceable, that provision or part of the provision is deemed severable from these Terms and does not affect the validity and enforceability of any remaining provisions.

case.text: Invalidity of any portion of the Terms of Service does not entail invalidity of its remainder

clauses.title: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and for the activities on your account
clauses.description: You are responsible for protecting the confidentiality of your password and for maintaining the security of your account. Any activity occurring under your account is your responsibility, whether authorized by you or not.
clauses.clause_text: You also must maintain the security of your account and promptly notify us if you discover or suspect that someone has accessed your account without your permission. You are responsible for all activities that occur in connection with your account and accept all risks of unauthorized access.

case.text: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and for the activities on your account

clauses.title: Users agree not to use the service for illegal purposes
clauses.description: The user agrees not to commit any unlawful acts through the use of the website, including the posting of illegal content or messaging.
clauses.clause_text: Full Text: "You will not: [...] Use our Platform for any illegal or unauthorized purpose, or engage in, encourage or promote any activity that violates these Terms."

case.text: You agree not to use the service for illegal purposes

clauses.title: The service may change its terms at any time, but the user will receive notification of the changes.
clauses.description: The Terms may be updated without prior notice, but users will be notified of the changes at the moment they will start applying.
clauses.clause_text:
We may make changes to these Terms from time to time.
If we make changes, we will post the amended Terms to our Platform and update the "Last Updated" date above.
We may also attempt to notify you by sending an email notification to the address associated with your account or providing notice through our Platform.

case.text: The terms may be changed at any time, but you will receive notification of the changes
